title: Every 2nd patent granted since 2016 relates to Green tech; most linked to waste, alternative energy - Times of India
content: Every 2nd patent granted since 2016 relates to Green tech; most linked to waste, alternative energy  Times of India
description: India News: BENGALURU: Every second patent granted in India between 2016-2021 is related to green technology and a quarter of the green technology patents are con.
